citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Pacific Biological Station
citeinfo.title: Shellfish Harvest Log Databases (Canada)

descript.abstract:
Harvest logs supplied by commercial invertebrate fishers.
Measurement Details Records for commercial fishing vessels, date, location, gear, and amount of catch for various species, as well as an indication of effort required to make that catch. Separate databases maintained for each species.
Canadian Pacific Coast
Other Comments The data collection process provides many opportunities for error and misinterpretation. Although the data sets have been cleaned up *enormously* in the past year, they should not be thought of as 100% accurate. Accuracy is improved as time and new information permits. Currently the data resides in a set of independent MS ACCESS databases for each fishery or species. Eventually they will all be consolidated into a single ORACLE database.
A TCODE project

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
